item.description:
Join us for a relaxing afternoon of wine tasting (Optional, Cost is $7.42 - which includes an engraved Gouveia wine glass), live music, eating and socializing. Besides purchasing individual glasses of wine for consumption, bottles of wine can also be purchased for consumption on the premises or to take out. This vineyard has been a real popular event in the past. The vineyard is located about 2 miles off of I-91 (Exit 14). The live music begins at 4:00 and continues to 7:00 with singer/guitarist Rob Gagne.

Please bring an appetizers/hors d'oeuvre to share. Here are some ideas: cheese & crackers, pepperoni, shrimp and dip, grapes, meatballs, chocolate covered strawberries, etc. Just use your imagination if you want to bring something different or ask a friend for help, but something that pairs with wine.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Wine Tasting, Gouveia Vineyards, Wallingford, Saturday, Sept 25 @ 3:00 PM
